name: Lemon tart Low budget
description:
Here is a new attempt I made over the Lemon Tart profile. It certainly doesn't match Dinner Lady's offer, however people that tried it, found it much better in every aspect. It doesn't get tiring and it doesn't feel that harsh overall. Hope you enjoy it, 
Voodoo.
author: voodootroll

reviews.text: Best for me after 8-10 day steep. I found it fairly harsh after the recommended time of 3 days. It was still very LMP heavy. Around day 8 the tart/cookie flavor started to pull through. Solid recipe. One of the better ones that I've had. Will be mixing more!

Made this for my boss, he loves Dinner Lady’s Lemon Tart and wanted me to clone it for him. According to him, of all the recipes I’ve mixed for this profile (probably about 6 or 7) this is by far the closest to the original. I’m about to make this at 50/50 for my kayfun to see how it plays as MTL. Will report back with my findings!
Still after 5-6 months remains one option of my daily juice rotation... Very balanced, perfect tart, precise work with lemons.
I'm very impressed by the this straightforward and basic recipe. I find the bakery to fruit balance very nice.  I'm a huge lemon vape fan. This may be my favorite so far.
Great jod! Really low budget and it doesn't get tiring..
An excellent approach to the profile. Few ingredients, it steeps fast and it holds over time. I had the pleasure to try it and it is currently the best amongst simiral recipes.
